snippet: Mr. Thien, a dissident writer who wrote poetry opposing the Communist government in Vietnam, endured prolonged imprisonment, torture and solitary confinement.
abstract: Nguyen Chi Thien, Vietnamese dissident writer who spent nearly three decades in prison, dies at age 73.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Thien, a dissident writer who wrote poetry opposing the Communist government in Vietnam, endured prolonged imprisonment, torture and solitary confinement.

headline.seo: Nguyen Chi Thien, Vietnamese Dissident Poet, Dies at 73
headline.main: Nguyen Chi Thien, Whose Poems Spoke Truth to Power, From a Cell, Dies at 73
headline.print_headline: Nguyen Chi Thien, Whose Poems Spoke Truth to Power, From a Cell, Dies at 73
